actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to facilitate public access to public lands for recreational purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the use of proceeds from public land management area stamps (permits) issued by a State agency for acquiring land interests which provide public access over nonpublic lands to public lands for hunting, fishing, or trapping purposes.

titles.title: A bill to facilitate public access to public lands for recreational purposes.
